name: Lost Source
description:
LOST SOURCE

He is the only one who can pass through all the chalenges and restore the energy source of the world, a robot with a limited amount of energy that slowly goes down and needs to collect batery charges to keep power on.

* Download the game for better experience

Created for GoGodotJam 2 Commands:
    • use "A,D" or arrow key to move / left stick or dpad
    • space , arrow up or "W" to jump / A button
    • "X" to interact / B button
    • "Z" to dash / X button
Credits: Cristiano Silva:
